etymology.description: Depicts an old man with long hair -> ancient variant 镸 still used
etymology.interpretation: The character 長(長) (cháng, "long") originates as a pictogram representing an old man with long hair, symbolizing longevity. The ancient variant 镸 holds the same meaning and depicts the same image of elongated hair as a sign of age and wisdom.

examples.chinese: 这条街镸(這條街長)，直通远方(直通遠方)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè tiáo jiē cháng, zhí tōng yuǎn fāng.
examples.english: This street is long, leading directly into the distance.
